	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

The side of the Trainer base exploded leaving a hole big enough for a mack =
truck.

Ignatius was forced off of his feat as the room shook, "Any bright =
ideas?" he asked the computer as the base shook. 

"Not to worry, I have ev=
erything under control." the computer replied in a rather diabolical voice.=
 

Energy crackled through the hallways as internal shields lit up the wall=
s preventing an easy passage for the intruder. Behind Hellpeon the shield b=
egan to get closer to the Trainer base and a seperate forcefield was set up=
 above him preventing skyward flight. The shield was broadened to surround =
the ship now cutting the invader off from the rest of the troops.
  ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
  From: Legendarynemasis@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, June 13, 2001 10:48 AM
  Subject: Re: Master=
 Plan


  As Darkfate typed the ground within the shields bulged before it =
exploded 
  outwards in to the shield. After this Hellpeon steps out of the=
 hole he had 
  dug, once again in robot mode. The bot then looks to the tr=
ainers base and 
  cackles as he opens fire on it with the devastating chao=
chitan energy. 
  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms =
of Service.
